transcript:
for me working for the longest time was
my way of of numbing I would work work
work work work to be running away from
this thing that I didn't want to pay
attention to this emotional problems
from when I was younger and traumas that
I was running from because I'm so
constantly busy working I don't have
enough time to look at those things and
so the hard part about that one for a
lot of people that are Workaholics is
that being a workaholic is also rewarded
and looked up upon like people are like
that's awesome you work so hard I wish I
could work as hard as you and it's
actually kind of like hey good job for
that but you know kind of the exact same
thing as being a drug addict though you
know it's like that was my drug that's
many people's drug and it's like going
up to a drug addict being like hey
congratulations you're addicted to
heroin like that's not the right thing
to say to somebody
